rows.label: bf02010100_0010
rows.name:
...And so
I barely escaped with my life.

rows.label: bf02010100_0020
rows.name: Don't 'and so' me!

rows.label: bf02010100_0025
rows.name: Are you an idiot?

rows.label: bf02010100_0030
rows.name:
Why couldn't you just die properly. 
What will you do if they demand a refund.

rows.label: bf02010100_0040
rows.name:
Huh? Die?
 And what do you mean 'refund?'

rows.label: bf02010100_0050
rows.name: Meh! None of your business.

rows.label: bf02010100_0060
rows.name: So where did Rex and that Blade go?

rows.label: bf02010100_0070
rows.name: The Divine Beast took Rex and the others.

rows.label: bf02010100_0080
rows.name:
Fled south from the Tornea Sea.
After that we lost track of them.

rows.label: bf02010100_0090
rows.name: You see, the storm was very fierce so...

rows.label: bf02010100_0100
rows.name: So you don't know?

rows.label: bf02010100_0110
rows.name: Correct...

rows.label: bf02010100_0120
rows.name: And then you ran away?

rows.label: bf02010100_0130
rows.name: Y-yes, but-

rows.label: bf02010100_0140
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh-meh-meh!
I don't want to hear excuses!

rows.label: bf02010100_0150
rows.name: Hurry up and get back here!

rows.label: bf02010100_0160
rows.name: There's a mountain of work piled up.

rows.label: bf02010100_0170
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh... Even though we had insurance 
on the Uzushio, this is a big loss.

rows.label: bf02010100_0180
rows.name: However...

rows.label: bf02010100_0190
rows.name: If they went south from the Tornea Sea...

rows.label: bf02010100_0200
rows.name:
In current season, that likely
take them to Gula.

rows.label: bf02010100_0210
rows.name: Get Consul Morph on the line immediately!

rows.label: bf02010100_0220
rows.name:
Understood
Please wait a moment.

rows.label: bf02010100_0230
rows.name:
Well well, Chairman Bahn
Thank you for your help the other day.

rows.label: bf02010100_0240
rows.name:
May I just say that I admire how you
rebranded those broken Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf02010100_0250
rows.name:
And selling them on to the dunderheads
back in Superbia - absolutely sublime!

rows.label: bf02010100_0260
rows.name: I don't need your disgusting flattery.

rows.label: bf02010100_0270
rows.name:
Besides, talking about Core Crystals over communication.
Are you an idiot too?

rows.label: bf02010100_0280
rows.name:
What will you do if 
the Arcedia intercepts this?

rows.label: bf02010100_0290
rows.name:
O-oh, of course!
I'm very sorry!

rows.label: bf02010100_0300
rows.name:
Well, more importantly
I have some good news.

rows.label: bf02010100_0310
rows.name: Oh? What's going on?

rows.label: bf02010100_0320
rows.name: Listen up...
